title: Crowdsourcing-Based Collaborative Instructional Design Pedagogy in Technology-Enhanced Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories, digital tool proficiency, and language pedagogy knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical training course for pre-service teachers to collaboratively design classroom-applicable learning content

learning_goals: Learners can collect language learning content feedback from diverse stakeholders using crowdsourcing platforms.
Learners can develop user-centered language learning materials by applying co-design principles.
Learners can propose learning content improvement plans using a structured feedback system.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
